pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Characteristics of Seasonal and Sporadic Infectious Disease Outbreaks Using Generalized Additive Modeling with Penalized Basis Splines // Inference of infectious disease outcomes using generalized additive (mixed) models with penalized basis splines (P-Splines). See https://medrxiv.org/cgi/content/short/2020.07.14.20138180v1.
